name: Fibber Kit
description:
An experimental game from our team- Fibber Kit!
A sandbox where the player will be able to set up physical experiments.
The game has a set of simple details with which the player can reproduce the experiment or create his own mechanism!

A short story about this game.
As a child, I was fond of mechanisms. My closet was filled with various parts, motors, and more. I really enjoyed soldering. Once, during another soldering, a drop of hot tin almost hit my eye! A centimeter and I would go blind! Since then, I have ceased to get involved in mechanisms and freed up my closet.

Our simulator can give an idea of ​​the simplest mechanisms and help to avoid dangerous situations in real life.
